price: Wenn diese da Götter wären, gingen sie nicht zu ihr hinab. Und alle werden ewig darin bleiben.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
